page.title: 14NEWSPAPER INNERLEITHEN
page.content: {On St Ronan's to France! That is where pupils are heading in May 1985,as the only British representatives in an international football tournament.Invited by the {Nouvion Athletic Club}in the Borders twin Region{Thierache} ,the boys will visit their link school Sorle le Chateau.24 teams from the Netherlands, France,Belgium and Germany will play. New yellow/black strips,gifts from their hosts,and the finance for the trip has been generously given by local businesses.With the boys will be head teacher Alastair Campbell,who said "I see the development of links as a most worth while exercise for all concerned.I hope the enthusiasm shown by the pupils in both countries will create an interest in the forging of contacts between groups and businesses in both communities."
